description: General Susumu, also known as the Black Daimyo, is the Tian Xia patron deity of samurai who are interested more in glory and battle than honor and heroism. He is the brother of Shizuru, and the two seldom see eye to eye. His unholy symbol is a black winged horse, and he is worshiped primarily in Chu Ye, Hongal, Kaoling, Minkai, Shokuro, and Xa Hoi.
name: General Susumu
